Ah the good old "idc" defense.
It's ok to admit you're not Challenger level, Challenger is pretty hard to get if you're not good enough.
It's ok to admit that some 13 year old are better than you and your anger only stems from a few inters of which some of them were probably even older than you.
Hell, I'm way over 18 and check out my match history, I sometimes go 1-9 too.

* Age != Gameplay skill or ability to play as a team.
* IQ != Gameplay skill or ability to play as a team.

As a result, this suggestion is pretty dead in the water.
You do know that the vast majority of "immature kids" on line are actually 20-30 something year old dudes and that It's actually rare to have an actual teen/kid be the immature one?
I actually don't disagree with the age requirement.
